briefdescription.para: Should be called a by Entity when System.update() is called.

detaileddescription.para:
You should never override this function. Instead, override customUpdate()
InitializationError
If the property ENTITY_INIT is false, meaning init() was not called.

briefdescription.para: Should be called a by Entity when System.init() is called.

detaileddescription.para:
You should never override this function. Instead, override customInit()
This function will make this Entity dirty.
ENTITY_DIRTY
InitializationError
If the property ENTITY_INIT is true, meaning init() has already been called.

briefdescription.para: Should be called a by Entity when System.terminate() is called.

detaileddescription.para: Calls customDestroy(). Sets ENTITY_INIT to be false

You should never override this function. Instead, override customDestroy()
This function will make this Entity dirty.
ENTITY_DIRTY
InitializationError
If the property ENTITY_INIT is false, meaning init() was not called.

briefdescription.para: Should be called by a Entity when the graphical Window clears the frame.

detaileddescription.para: You should never override this function. Instead, override customRender()

briefdescription.para: Compares if 2 Entities have the same children, parent, and properties.

parameterdescription.para: An Entity compare this one to

simplesect.para: true if they are equal
operator!=

briefdescription.para: When Entity.update() is called, customUpdate() is called on all of it's children.
When Entity.init() is called, customInit() is called on all of it's children.
When Entity.destroy() is called, customDestroy() is called on all of it's children.
When Entity.render() is called, customRender() is called on all of it's children.
